abstracts.cdata!:
The First Highway Project consists of
            rehabilitating and improving 13 sections of trunk roads
            totalling some 345 miles; consultants for supervision of
            construction, pre-investment studies for further road
            rehabilitation, and preparation of road maintenance project;
            and the provision of equipment for traffic control and
            pavement surveys.
